scripts.lint: if [ -f ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ]; then ./node_modules/.bin/eslint "src/**/*.js"; else echo "No lint script configured"; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: if ls ./tests/unit/*.test.js > /dev/null 2>&1; then node --test ./tests/unit/*.test.js; else echo "No unit tests defined"; fi
scripts.test:integration: if ls ./tests/integration/*.test.js > /dev/null 2>&1; then node --test ./tests/integration/*.test.js; else echo "No integration tests defined"; fi
scripts.test:e2e: if ls ./tests/e2e/*.test.js > /dev/null 2>&1; then node --test ./tests/e2e/*.test.js; else echo "No end-to-end tests defined"; fi
